channel.title: How Do I Make Donators And SafeZone And NPC Drop Stuff? [NEW]
channel.description: I Got 317 Allstar Server And I Made Lamps, I Want To Make Death Spawn Drop Them About 8% Chance To Get It Every Kill And I Tried Editing NpcDrops.Cfg But It Dont Work Maybe I Do Something Wrong Look At This, [code] npcdrop = 1614 2528 1 10 npcdrop = 2060 2528 1 10 [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST] [/code] And None Of Them Work, I Made Donator Zone And Teleport For It And It Just Dosent Work I Made Teleport For Owner Only And I Only Know It I Wanna Make Donators And SafeZone Is Well I Found A Nice Place To Move Shops But Its Wildy I Wanna Make It Safe I Tryied This And Didn't Work: [code] || (absX >= 3017 && absX <= 9732 && absY >= 3039 && absY <= 3039) || (absX >= 2821 && absX <= 2841 && absY >= 9806 && absY <= 9704) [/code] And It Didint Work It Still Shows Wild Pls Help I Will Make You Admin On My Server

item.title: How Do I Make Donators And SafeZone And NPC Drop Stuff? [NEW]
item.dc:creator: @aurisdj aurisdj
item.description:
@aurisdj wrote:

I Got 317 Allstar Server And I Made Lamps, I Want To Make Death Spawn Drop Them About 8% Chance To Get It Every Kill And I Tried Editing NpcDrops.Cfg But It Dont Work Maybe I Do Something Wrong Look At This,

npcdrop = 1614	2528	1	10
npcdrop = 2060	2528	1	10
[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]

And None Of Them Work, I Made Donator Zone And Teleport For It And It Just Dosent Work I Made Teleport For Owner Only And I Only Know It I Wanna Make Donators And SafeZone Is Well I Found A Nice Place To Move Shops But Its Wildy I Wanna Make It Safe I Tryied This And Didnâ€™t Work:

				|| (absX >= 3017 && absX <= 9732 && absY >= 3039 && absY <= 3039)
				|| (absX >= 2821 && absX <= 2841 && absY >= 9806 && absY <= 9704)

And It Didint Work It Still Shows Wild Pls Help I Will Make You Admin On My Server

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Make Donators And SafeZone And NPC Drop Stuff? [NEW]
